DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness unique web base educational tool call `` Family Heroes , '' design educate family Post Traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) provide practical tool interact affect veteran family member . The study include veteran family member choosing . Participants randomly assign group take online train group take training . Both group complete baseline questionnaire follow questionaire 60 day later . The study examine number Veteran Affairs ( VA ) mental health visit .
DOC.brief_title: The Family Heroes : Evaluation Online Educational Tool
DOC.criteria: Male female Operation Iraqi Freedom/ Operation Enduring Freedom ( OIF/OEF ) veteran Positive PTSD , base PTSD Checklist ( PCL ) score great equal 50 Availability family member willing participate study AND contact veteran 3 time per week Ability access computer internet access take educational training survey Not OIF/OEF veteran Negative PTSD , base PCL score le 50 Unavailability family member willing participate study contact veteran 3 time per week Inability access computer internet access take educational training survey
